articles.author: Delfin Dioquino
articles.title: E-Gilas back in action for FIBA Esports Open III - Rappler
articles.description: E-Gilas Pilipinas, the Southeast Asia champion of the inaugural FIBA Esports Open, looks to repeat its winning ways over 5 other teams
articles.content: The Filipino crew is also comprised of Philippe Herrero IV, Aljon Cruzin, Custer Galas, Ian Santiago, Arnie Sison, and Clark Banzon.

articles.title: Baby can't wait: Woman delivers child while working from home - AsiaOne
articles.description: Time and tide wait for no one, and neither does the baby. Just after a woman hit send on a work email, her water broke. The 35-year-old civil servant, who had been working from home, ambled to the toilet to discover her unborn child's head had partially emerg…

articles.title: India-Pakistan tension may escalate, full-scale war possible, warns US intel report - Zee News
articles.description: India and Pakistan may get engaged into a large-scale war that neither side wants, a US intelligence report has warned while exploring the possibilities of miscalculations leading to a war in South Asia.

articles.title: Fave acquired by Pine Labs for RM185 mil, will launch in India this year - SoyaCincau.com
articles.description: With the acquisition, Pine Labs aims to reinforce Fave's market position in Southeast Asia. Fave will also launch in India this year via Pine Lab's merchant network.
